As a result of this re-evaluation , linguists established the Communicative Language Teaching ( CLT ) Approach as an alternative method , in which person - to - person communication is both a principle and a goal .

Dell Hymns , one of the revolutionary linguistic thinkers of the decade , argued that in order to be fluent and accurate in a certain language , students should master communicative and language functions .
